price: Nítorí náà, ẹ jẹ nínú ohun tí ẹ kó ní ọrọ̀ ogun (tí ó jẹ́) ẹ̀tọ́ (àti) n̄ǹkan dáadáa. Kí ẹ sì bẹ̀rù Allāhu. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Aláforíjìn, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā ghanim'tum ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
